item.title: SEN RAND PAUL: There are $186 billion reasons why we must audit the Fed
item.description: The Federal Reserve's unchecked power and secretive operations have led to billions in payments to banks while operating at a loss. We need more overs...

item.title: Euro, investor sentiment rises after US-EU agree to framework trade deal
item.description: The euro rose on Monday following a framework trade deal reached over the weekend between the United States and the European Union.
